titleStmt.title: The consolations of David, breefly applied to Queene Elizabeth in a sermon preached in Oxford the 17. of Nouember. By Iohn Prime, 1588.
titleStmt.author: Prime, John, 1550-1596.

publicationStmt.publisher: By Ioseph Barnes, and are to be sold [by T. Cooke] in Paules Church-yeard, at the signe of the Tygres head,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.

place.placeName: Paules Church-yeard, at the signe of the Tygres head
